title: Analysis of Maxwell Equations in a Gravitational Field

summary:
In a gravitational field, we analyze the Maxwell equations, the correponding
electromagnetic wave and continuity equations. A particular solution for
parellel electric and magnetic fields in a gravitational background is
presented. These solutions also satisfy the free-wave equations and the
phenomenology suggested by plasma physics.

Abstract
In a gravitational field, we analyze the Maxwell equations, the correponding electromagnetic wave and continuity equations. A particular solution for parellel electric and
magnetic fields in a gravitational background is presented. These solutions also satisfy
the free-wave equations and the phenomenology suggested by plasma physics.
